movies.title: The Portal
movies.plot: A dimension-traveling wizard gets stuck in the 21st century because cell-phone radiation interferes with his magic. With his home world on the brink of war, he seeks help from a jaded travel agent who he mistakes for a great sorceress. Without his powers to prove his identity, she has trouble taking him seriously, but finally agrees to reveal the secrets of our world in exchange for a lunch date.
movies.simplePlot: A dimension-traveling wizard gets stuck in the 21st century because cell-phone radiation interferes with his magic. With his home world on the brink of war, he seeks help from a jaded ...

biography.bio: He is the son of former Yukon premier Anthony David John Penikett (Tony). A graduate of the Victoria Motion picture school, Tahmoh also studied at the Lyric School of Acting in Vancouver. Tahmoh and his family (his father, and his twin sisters Sarah and Stephanie) make their home in Vancouver, British Columbia.
biography.name: Tahmoh Penikett

biography.bio: Erin Karpluk was born on October 17, 1978 in Jasper, Alberta, Canada. She is an actress and producer, known for Les vies rêvées d'Erica Strange (2009), Assault on Wall Street (2013) and Game of Fear (2014).
biography.name: Erin Karpluk

biography.bio: Penelope Corrin was born on November 28, 1975 in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada. She is an actress and writer, known for Fantastic Four (2005), The Portal (2014) and The Armoire (2009).
biography.name: Penelope Corrin

biography.bio: It looks like we don't have any Biography for David Oliver Mes yet.
biography.name: David Oliver Mes

biography.bio: Vittorio Claudio Masciulli was born in Villamagna Italy and emigrated to Canada on the boat Saturna to Halifax Nova Scotia on November 1955. Claudio played professional ice hockey in Europe before meeting Donald Sutherland in Montreal in the Summer of 1977. Mr Sutherland suggested that Claudio Masciulli decide to study and become a professional actor. Claudio took up the gauntlet and had studies with second city in Edmonton Alberta and also with Mark Schoenberg. Mark suggested that Claudio go to North Carolina and work in outdoor drama, which he did, doing shows in Ohio, North Carolina and New Jersey. In 1987 Claudio was asked to join the famous Williamson Theatre Company. He was involved in the 50th anniversary of the groups theatre production of Golden Boy directed by Joanne Woodward. Claudio resides in Toronto Canada and pursues film and television work. One highlight was shooting gle undesirables on the same lot =cinecitta in Rome Italy that Donald Sutherland was working when he met actor back in 1977.
biography.name: Claudio Masciulli

biography.bio: Geoffrey Antoine is an actor, known for Paid in Full (2002), Loser (2000) and The Portal (2014).
biography.name: Geoffrey Antoine

biography.bio: Chantelle Chung was born in 1992 in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. She is an actress, known for Scott Pilgrim vs. the World (2010), Kick-Ass 2 (2013) and Sophie (2008).
biography.name: Chantelle Chung

biography.bio: Alex Furber is an actor, known for The Portal (2014), Air Emergency (2003) and Les enquêtes de Murdoch (2008).
biography.name: Alex Furber

biography.bio: Zehra Leverman is an actress, known for X-Men: Days of Future Past (2014), X-Men: Apocalypse (2016) and Battle Queen 2020 (2001).
biography.name: Zehra Leverman

biography.bio: Mary Pitt is an actress, known for Baby-sittor (2005), Take This Waltz (2011) and Hairspray (2007).
biography.name: Mary Pitt

biography.bio: Misha Rasaiah is known for her work on Hairspray (2007), American Pie Presents: Beta House (2007) and Camp Rock (2008).
biography.name: Misha Rasaiah

biography.bio: Dylan Roberts was born on November 28, 1971 in Bangor, North Wales, UK. He is known for his work on Closing the Ring (2007), Amelia (2009) and Kit Kittredge: An American Girl (2008).
biography.name: Dylan Roberts
